sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.VAPreTopicDiscoveryInputProcessor</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>VAPreTopicDiscoveryInputProcessor</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var VAPreTopicDiscoveryInputProcessor = Class.create();
VAPreTopicDiscoveryInputProcessor.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	process: function(input) {
		var featurePayload = {};
		
		// Prepare payload for Virtual Agent Language Detection
		var langDetect = {"utterance" : input["utterance"]};
		
		featurePayload["Virtual Agent Language Detection"] = langDetect;
		return featurePayload;
	},
	
	shouldPause: function(input) {
		return false;
	},

    type: 'VAPreTopicDiscoveryInputProcessor'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-22 04:51:39</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7614850753920110a260ddeeff7b123e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>VAPreTopicDiscoveryInputProcessor</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Glide Conversation Server" source="com.glide.cs">f9f62e472f000110d8a4d5f62799b60c</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7614850753920110a260ddeeff7b123e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-03-22 04:58:45</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>515</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
